articles.author: Isobel Koshiw
articles.title: Trump backs Putin’s proposal for Ukraine talks, undermining allies - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s endorsement came the day after he backed European leaders’ demand for a ceasefire first.
articles.content: KYIV President Donald Trump on Sunday backed Russian President Vladimir Putins call for direct talks with Ukraine, breaking his administrations agreement with European leaders announced less than 24 … [+3407 chars]
